name: Aster Defense
description:
Protect the Earth from its imminent destruction!

Deploy turrets to destroy de asteroids, Shields to prevent being hit and radars to detect where the danger is coming from.

With each asteroid destroyed you´ll earn money to create more turrets.

CONTROLS:

Camera Movement: W, A, S, D / Arrow keys

Camera ZOOM: SCROLL WHEEL

Click on the buttons on the bottom of the screen and then on a spot in an orbit near the Earth to build. You can only build SHIELDS on the first orbit.

SATELLITES:

SHIELDS -> Stops asteroids. Can resist only 1 hit

TURRETS -> Shoots at asteroid. Limited detection range. Can resist only 1 hit

RADARS -> Huge detection range. Will share detected asteroids to TURRETS in range. Can resist only 1 hit

Good luck!
